title: Why Your Nonprofit Needs an AI Strategy | Torchbox

metadata.description: There's a huge opportunity to amplify your nonprofit's impact and unlock the value of AI in your organisation. But to take advantage of this change every organisation needs a clear strategy of how to engage with AI. Here's where to start.
